Text: Salisbury Woodland Gardens, Blackpool:  Popular once as a wedding photograph location, the site went into decline during the 1990s.

Text: Salisbury Woodland Gardens, Blackpool:  The Council's Ranger Service manage and protect the gardens which they took over in September 2006 and have been funding and undertaking the restoration of the woodland.
